title: Permutation eSports Looking for Players
body:
Permutation eSports is putting together a completely fresh roster. We need a Top, Jungle, Mid, ADC and Support. We will also need an Analyst and a Coach. 

Requirements:
Working Microphone
Plat 5+ Solo Queue (Players)
Coach and Analyst don't need any experience (I can train you!) however those with more experience will generally be considered first for their role. 

Practice starts on Monday 14 November so we want to have our roster completed by Saturday 12 November at the latest!
Please be sure to leave any questions you may have below or feel free to add me in game BurstFire303.

PS - In the event that we receive an overwhelming number of suitable applicants, trials will begin on Monday 14 November and, depending on numbers, we may create additional teams!

replies.body: You really need to be more open minded, you only ever trying to get your point across blinded you from my point, which is a huge waste of both of our time. Do not try to shove your flawed perspective down my throat again.

Hi
I'm a plat 3 jungle main and I can play Nid, hec, reksai and kha zix jungle but can always expand my champ pool if needed and I'm interested in being part of your team.
would be keen to possibly play mid or top lane for ya, p3 rn, large champ pool

Yo,
Supp main that can play whoever you need. currently p3, and very keen to trial

Keen as ketchup!
I'm a plat 2 mid main who is willing to learn whatever the team needs, currently a zyra god.
If your looking for an analyst still i'd be interested to apply. I work a lot with replays when evaluating my self performance so i can use my knowledge of the "big picture" to aid the team :)
jg main: Mattsherona, diamond 5 (peaked diamond 2 few weeks ago)
